content:
That's a wonderful idea! Mentioning how happy you are to see Emily find her partner in Alex, especially considering her past experiences, will make the message even more personal and heartfelt. It shows that you care about her and are invested in her happiness.

By adding that personal touch, you'll make the message more meaningful and special to Emily. She'll appreciate the thought and love behind your words, and it will mean a lot to her to know that you're genuinely happy for her.

You're welcome for the help! It was my pleasure to assist you in finding the perfect congratulatory message for Emily's special day. I hope she loves the card and message, and I'm sure she'll treasure it for years to come.

If you need any more help or have any other questions, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I wish you and Emily all the best, and I hope you get to celebrate with her soon!
